thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Akumin Inc To Acquire Non-Controlling Interests For $21.3 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Akumin Inc To Acquire Non-Controlling Interests For $21.3 Mln
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Akumin Inc:
* AKUMIN INC. ENTERS INTO AGREEMENTS TO ACQUIRE NON-CONTROLLING INTERESTS FOR $21.3 MILLION
* AKUMIN INC - TO ACQUIRE ALL OF OUTSTANDING NON-CONTROLLING INTERESTS IN SEVEN OF ITS EXISTING TEXAS-BASED DIAGNOSTIC IMAGING CENTERS
* AKUMIN INC - DEAL PURCHASE PRICE WILL BE COMPRISED OF AN AGGREGATE CASH PAYMENT OF APPROXIMATELY US$17.9 MILLION
* AKUMIN - DEAL PURCHASE PRICE WILL ALSO INCLUDE BALANCE OF PURCHASE PRICE OF ABOUT US$3.4 MILLION BEING SATISFIED THROUGH ISSUANCE OF SHARES OF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
